prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a slender feline deity, smooth purple skin, yellow eyes, large pointed ears, wearing **maroon silk robes with gold trim, secured by a wide gold obi belt, covering lower body**
feature_prompt: imposing feline deity, purple skin with natural texture, **flowing silk fabric, intricate gold details on robes**, macro skin detail, fine skin folds, subsurface scattering on ears
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic skin, smooth skin, human face, cat ears, flat lighting, low quality, **bare legs, exposed lower body, shorts, modern clothing**
